ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Allows users to conduct multivariate distance matrix regression using analytic p-values and compute measures of effect size. For details on the method, see McArtor, Lubke, & Bergeman (2017) <doi:10.1007/s11336-016-9527-8>.

Allows users to conduct multivariate distance matrix regression using analytic p-values and compute measures of effect size. For details on the method, see McArtor, Lubke, & Bergeman (2017) <doi:10.1007/s11336-016-9527-8>.

name: r-mdmr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.5.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mdmr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/MDMR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/MDMR/MDMR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1cfe0494cf09659b27025f796f56d46444ec56d3d323645410f5ee8f94b49aba

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-compquadform
    - r-car
    - r-lme4
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-compquadform
    - r-car
    - r-lme4

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('MDMR')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('MDMR')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://github.com/dmcartor/mdmr
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Allows users to conduct multivariate distance matrix regression using analytic p-values and compute measures of effect size. For details on the method, see McArtor, Lubke, & Bergeman (2017) <doi:10.1007/s11336-016-9527-8>.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - mcornwell1957

# Package: MDMR
# Type: Package
# Title: Multivariate Distance Matrix Regression
# Version: 0.5.1
# Date: 2018-02-11
# Author: Daniel B. McArtor (dmcartor@gmail.com) [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Daniel B. McArtor <dmcartor@gmail.com>
# Description: Allows users to conduct multivariate distance matrix regression using analytic p-values and compute measures of effect size. For details on the method, see McArtor, Lubke, & Bergeman (2017) <doi:10.1007/s11336-016-9527-8>.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# LazyData: TRUE
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.0),
# Imports: CompQuadForm, parallel, lme4, car
# Suggests: knitr, rmarkdown
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# URL: http://github.com/dmcartor/mdmr
# BugReports: http://github.com/dmcartor/mdmr/issues
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-02-14 03:41:15 UTC; Dan
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-02-14 18:16:13 UTC
